body_html:
That's a good idea :)
Let me share them here first:

All the instructions are in line with here, please see the page for all the prerequisites:
https://github.com/google/protobuf/blob/master/src/README.md

Then I tried to run the following commands:
git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf.git
cd protobuf
./autogen.sh
CXXFLAGS="-fPIC -g -O2" ./configure
make -j12
export PROTOC=$PWD/src/protoc
cd python
python3.4 setup.py bdist_wheel --cpp_implementation --compile_static_extension
cd dist

The wheel file will be in the "dist" directory.

body:
That's a good idea :)
Let me share them here first:

All the instructions are in line with here, please see the page for all the prerequisites:
https://github.com/google/protobuf/blob/master/src/README.md

Then I tried to run the following commands:
git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf.git
cd protobuf
./autogen.sh
CXXFLAGS="-fPIC -g -O2" ./configure
make -j12
export PROTOC=$PWD/src/protoc
cd python
python3.4 setup.py bdist_wheel --cpp_implementation --compile_static_extension
cd dist

The wheel file will be in the "dist" directory.
